DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare current standing balance assessment methods to a new method that measures weight shift during small movements of a sliding platform. It will also be used to determine if balance improves with repeated exposure as part of a 4-week training program.
DOC.brief_title: Assessing and Improving Balance Using Platform Perturbations
DOC.criteria: Healthy no balance deficits age 2035 or 5065 moderate to severe arthritis
